item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: So are you running around on Middle Earth, Foton. I don't know why but three months ago when I preordered the game I was a cheap ass and selected cheap shipping. By the time I get the game, my two level 15 characters will be way behind the level 50s that will inevitably be out there. Next Day shipping is actually worth it sometimes.
item.content:encoded: So are you running around on Middle Earth, Foton. I don’t know why but three months ago when I preordered the game I was a cheap ass and selected cheap shipping. By the time I get the game, my two level 15 characters will be way behind the level 50s that will inevitably be out there. Next Day shipping is actually worth it sometimes.

item.title: By: Puhase
item.dc:creator: Puhase
item.description: Foton, it wasn't an accident. We call moments such as those a "Freudian Click".
item.content:encoded: Foton, it wasn’t an accident. We call moments such as those a “Freudian Click”.

item.title: By: Jay
item.dc:creator: Jay
item.description: What happened to the BabbleOn story?? I never get any good guild drama so I live vicariously through you.
item.content:encoded: What happened to the BabbleOn story?? I never get any good guild drama so I live vicariously through you.
